title: Allow downloading of submissioned .xap files
body: Allow downloading of submissioned .xap files in Windows Phone application publish submission process. Currently you can "add", "delete" and "replace" file but cannot download .xap file for easy re-editing (unzip/modify/zip) after failed certification test, or whatever other purpose.

comments.body: I accidentally deleted my source code. I think downloading .xap may be the only way I can get my code back.
This is now allowed with a purpose. XAP files can be decompiled and code can be obtained. You IP (Intellectual property) is no longer protected if XAP downloads are allowed.
